articles.title: Sarah Snook: The Picture of Dorian Gray is 'unmissable', theatre critics say - BBC.com
articles.description: The Succession star appears in a stage adaptation of Oscar Wilde's novel The Picture of Dorian Gray.
articles.content:
By Steven McIntoshEntertainment reporter
The Financial Times said Sarah Snook gives a "virtuoso performance" in The Picture of Dorian Gray
Actress Sarah Snook has been warmly praised by critics for… [+5737 chars]
